attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
More and more people in the UK are trying to get their pets tattooed.
Not only is this cruel but the animal can also die of ink poisoning.
Some people take them into tattooists where they are still wide awake and can feel the pain of it - they dont want tattoos but they dont have a choice.
Others get vets to tattoo their pets while undergoing operations.
This is sick and wrong, it is cruel and must be stopped!
